freeSlotNumber.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The number of bike racks or docking slots available for returning and parking bikes in the bike docking station corresponding to this observation.

availableBikeNumber.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The number of bikes available in the bike hire docking station to be hired by users.

totalSlotNumber.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The total number of bike racks or docking slots in bike docking station corresponding to this observation.

outOfServiceSlotNumber.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The number of bike racks or docking slots that are out of order and cannot be used to hire or park a bike in the bike docking station corresponding to this observation.

stationName.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The name of the bike hire docking station corresponding to this observation.

mediaURL.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. URL providing further information of any image(s) or media of the complaint or place.

agency_url.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The agency_url field contains the URL of the transit agency. SameAs: 'agency_url' field from GTFS Static Field Definition - agency.txt (https://developers.google.com/transit/gtfs/reference#agencytxt)

agency_name.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The agency_name field contains the full name of the transit agency. SameAs: 'agency_name' field from GTFS Static Field Definition - agency.txt (https://developers.google.com/transit/gtfs/reference#agencytxt)

stationCode.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The station number or station code of the bike hire docking station corresponding to the observation.

observationDateTime.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Last reported time of observation.
